basics.name: Alik del Risco
basics.label: Senior Software Developer with +8 years of experience as a professional.
basics.summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with a proven track record, including participation in the Caribbean Final of the ACM-ICPC in 2015 and numerous national competitive programming contests. Passionate about emerging technologies, software architecture, and knowledge sharing. Adept at both independent work and collaborative team environments, emphasizing meticulous planning and adherence to best practices for high-quality code. Committed to delivering innovative solutions while fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

work.name: Rideco - Operations Center
work.position: Team Leader and Senior Fullstack Developer
work.summary: Assembled and led a team of 5 members in the comprehensive rewrite of an Operations Center web application, a crucial component of the RideCo platform. The application is highly customizable and has plenty of feature flags to cover all the customers' needs. The user interface was built using Vue and consumes REST endpoints provided by Django Rest Framework.

work.name: Musala Soft - MagentaZuhause Smart Home
work.summary: Developed the Smarthome solution mobile app for Deutsche Telekom. Collaborating with +100 members divided into multiple teams. Connecting various devices' vendors and microservices data through Graphql endpoints and providing rich user interfaces using React Native.

work.name: Musala Soft - Elopage Media Categorizer
work.summary: Elopage Media Categorizer is a microservice that detects inappropriate, unwanted, or offensive content. Worked as the main backend developer, implementing REST endpoints, consuming AWS services, and communicating with the existing microservices.

work.name: Musala Soft - Leanplum React Native SDK
work.summary: Worked as a Mobile developer wrapping and modifying the existing Android and iOS SDKs into a React Native npm package.

work.name: Freelancer - Agile Business Platform
work.summary: Founded a non-code tool for building agile software hosted in the biggest cloud providers. Developed and designed the serverless backend microservices. Managed the infrastructure as code using Terraform and multiple services from GCP and AWS.

work.name: Freelancer - EntregasCuba
work.position: Team Leader, Devops, and Backend Developer.
work.summary: Led the development of a specific platform for cash delivery in Cuba with a team of 5 members. Designed and executed a microservices architecture supported by RabbitMQ, Apollo Graphql Federation, Sagas, CQRS, and Event-Driven Architecture.

work.name: DATYS - Papyrus
work.summary: Worked as a Fullstack Developer with Groovy, Java, Grails and Javascript, AngularJs. Contributed to a Document Management System with a powerful process modeling tool based on Camunda.

education.institution: University of Informatics Sciences, Havana, Cuba
